synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: TTFTC-Me4 (20 mg, 0.046 mmol), 0.5 M NaOH solution (1.6 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: rinsed with MeCN three times, soaked in MeCN for 12 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: TTFTC-Me4 (20 mg, 0.046 mmol), 0.5 M KOH solution (0.6 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: rinsed with MeCN three times, soaked in MeCN for 12 h
synthesis_conditions.notes: Upon exposing to air for 7 d, it turned black crystalline powder (2-ox)

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: TTFTC-Me4 (20 mg, 0.046 mmol), 0.5 M RbOH solution (0.6 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: rinsed with MeCN three times, soaked in MeCN for 12 h
synthesis_conditions.notes: Upon exposing to air for 7 d, it turned black crystalline powder (3-ox)

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: TTFTC-Me4 (5 mg, 0.0115 mmol), 0.5 M CsOH solution (0.15 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: rinsed with MeCN three times, soaked in MeCN for 12 h
synthesis_conditions.notes: Remained unchanged upon prolonged exposure to air
